major.title: Language-Conditioned Multi-Robot Systems
major.description: Research on multi-robot coordination systems that can understand and execute natural language instructions for collaborative tasks.

major.title: Solar-Powered Vehicle
major.description: Development and production of solar-powered vehicle for Bridgestone World Solar Challenge 2025 in Australia, driving 3000km with only solar power. Served as solar energy team leader, responsible for design, manufacture, optimization, and installation of solar panels. Also served as technical advisor for the mechanical team.

major.title: Language-Guided, Instruction aware Navigation
major.description: Language-Conditioned Routing: Developed a path generation algorithm that parses natural language instructions to adhere to both destination goals and complex user-specified constraints. Map-free Global Planning: Implemented a scalable planning system utilizing raw OpenStreetMap (OSM) data, eliminating the need for pre-built navigation databases. Dynamic Graph Adaptation: Integrated real-time perception modules to dynamically update navigation graphs, ensuring robust adaptability in changing environments.

major.title: Mobile Cable-Driven Parallel Robot (MCDPR)
major.description: Research on improving dynamic performance of MCDPR through hybrid force compensation, online geometry estimation, and tension control stability enhancement.

toy.title: Autoscroll Braille Device
toy.description: Award-winning design project: Autoscroll Braille Device for the blind. Won Grand Prize from Gachon University President and Silver Award from Healthcare Consortium Director.

toy.title: Smart Logistics Sorting System
toy.description: Award-winning project: Smart logistics sorting system using optimal route design. Won Silver Award from ICT Hanium Mentoring Contest.

toy.title: Pneumatic Water-Cooling 3D Printer Tool Changer
toy.description: Engineered a pneumatic-controlled water-cooling 3D-printer hot-swap tool-changer system with kinematically stabilized tool base.

toy.title: Low Inertia Flexible-Shaft 3D Printer Extruder
toy.description: Designed low inertia flexible-shaft and worm gear driven 3D printer extruder system for improved printing performance.

toy.title: 3D Printing Failure Detection with YOLO
toy.description: Conducted 3D printing failure (spaghetti) detection using YOLO transfer learning for automated quality control.

toy.title: VLA Model Deployment & Evaluation
toy.description: Deployment and evaluation of Vision-Language-Action models for autonomous robot systems. Research on proactive VLA for preemptive human assistance.

toy.title: Sim2Real RL Policy for Quadruped Locomotion
toy.description: Deployed reinforcement learning policies trained in simulation to real-world quadruped robots, focusing on robust locomotion and adaptation.

toy.title: Ergonomic Split Keyboard
toy.description: Designed and built a custom split ergonomic keyboard to reduce arm muscle tension caused by traditional keyboards with left/right keys clustered together. Features columnar stagger layout and thumb cluster for improved ergonomics.
